query: What are the main recommendations for aerobic physical activity for adults according to the WHO guidelines?
ideal_answer: Adults should do at least 150–300 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic physical activity, or at least 75–150 minutes of vigorous-intensity aerobic physical activity, or an equivalent combination throughout the week. Engaging in muscle-strengthening activities involving major muscle groups on 2 or more days a week provides additional health benefits. (Verify exact wording and source/page in your docs)

query: Explain the relationship between energy expenditure, physical activity, and weight management as described in the texts.
ideal_answer: Physical activity increases energy expenditure above resting rate. Moderate-to-vigorous activity significantly raises expenditure, aiding weight management by creating an energy deficit when combined with appropriate energy intake. Activity also helps build lean mass, further increasing energy needs. (Verify exact wording and source/page in your docs)
